item.title: Lower Lobe Cargo Compartment Smoke Detection System Detectors (Forward, Aft) – Freighter with Draw-Through Smoke Detection System – One Detector Per Smoke Zone Inoperative

remarks.para: One detector (loop A or B) per smoke zone may be inoperative provided remaining detector is verified to be operative before each departure.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Prior to each departure, verify the remaining smoke detector(s) are operative:
Push and hold the flight deck FIRE/OVHT TEST button on the overhead panel.
Verify proper system indications followed by EICAS FIRE TEST PASS message accompanied by the status message associated with the inoperative smoke detection loop(s).

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "LOWER LOBE COMP SMOKE DET LOOP A (or B) IS INOP". Enter Item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
